title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Roundwood Removals Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Roundwood Removals Survey) 

Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (roundwood removal survey) order 2021

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: In this Order -
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order - 

“removals”, in relation to roundwood, means the removal of roundwood 
following storm damage or any form of harvesting, including thinning; 

“standing timber value”, in relation to roundwood, means the value (excluding 
valued-added tax) of roundwood removed from a forest before the adjustment of 
such value to account for the costs associated with the removal of the roundwood 
concerned; 

“survey” means the Roundwood Removals Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in 
the Schedule.
text_norm: 2 order - removal relation roundwood mean removal roundwood following storm damage form harvesting including thinning standing timber value relation roundwood mean value (excluding valued-added tax) roundwood removed forest adjustment value account cost associated removal roundwood concerned survey mean roundwood removal survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 
December 20061, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20082, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20123 and 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
20 June 20194.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking classified statistical purpose section nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20061 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20082 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20123 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20194

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule in relation to each year in the period from 
2019 to 2023, is hereby prescribed. 

1 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
3 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L. 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

[112] 3 

Article 4
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking order applies provide purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation year period 2019 2023 hereby prescribed 1 oj no l 393 30.12.2006 p 1 2 oj no l 97 9.4.2008 p 13 3 oj no l 32 3.2.2012 p 1 4 oj no l 198 25.7.2019 p 241 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 19th march 2021 schedule 112 3 article 4

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity 
of the undertaking concerned, and specifying the year to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

the quantity of coniferous roundwood removals from privatelyowned forests in the State by or on behalf of the undertaking; 

the quantity of non-coniferous roundwood removals from 
privately-owned forests in the State by or on behalf of the 
undertaking; 

(c) 

the standing timber value of the roundwood referred to in 
subparagraphs (a) and (b).
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates business activity undertaking concerned specifying year information relates (a) (b) quantity coniferous roundwood removal privatelyowned forest state behalf undertaking quantity non-coniferous roundwood removal privately-owned forest state behalf undertaking (c) standing timber value roundwood referred subparagraphs (a) (b)

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking to complete the
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking to complete the 
questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my hand, 

10 March, 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach
